website_summaries.verdict: Combines a great size/footprint with a strap-down system that keeps it from flying away in heavy storms.
pros: Comes with a storage bag, as well as a tie-down strap
Works well in high wind and rain
cons: Some buyers found this option to actually be too large
The material is thin and doesn't appear to be as heavy-duty as other options

customer_reviews.title: Huge, Water RESISTANT
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brute force. I moved out and the place I rent doesn’t have a shop and I take pride in having clean vehicles and toys when I’m not working or enjoying them. I have pecan trees now and the sap is awful. So far so good. I washed it and covered it up. We recently had a rain and it was damp, but I live in the humid delta and I’m going to call it sweat. It’s a huge cover, I would never transport it with it covered. The strap is so so it works I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Willard

customer_reviews.title: they fit great..
customer_reviews.text: i dont know how you'd go wrong with this cover..... my quads sit on the trailer outside for most of the year.... the covers have been on for the past 3 months.... do not appear to be wearing with the weather or sun..... they fit great....... they stay on........ i don't think i would try trailering down the road with them on...... but sitting on the trailer the wind doesnt seem to bother. best bang for the buck no doubt. i just didnt want my machines to sit in full sunlight, take on bird crap, leaves, dust, snow, etc....... this is performing great and totally meeting my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: brian r lovegrove

customer_reviews.title: Very good, solid and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover in the fall to cover my four wheeler in the snow and winter weather here in Maine. It held up in every way including being waterproof and resistant to freezing weather and heavy snow. I'd highly recommend to anyone looking to cover their four wheeler.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A. Dieterich

customer_reviews.title: Legit product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits all the way over my Suzuki King Quad 500afi. As in it reaches the ground as it wraps around the tires. It stays in place and does a great job of protecting my quad from the elements since I can't park it inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kaj

customer_reviews.title: Covers with plenty of room.
customer_reviews.text: I can cover my ATV and still keep my milk crate (for carrying farm supplies) on it. It was out in a rainstorm and the cover held water and did not leak. The straps help to keep it secure even when the wind kicks up. The only thing I found to be faulty is the bag it comes with is pretty much impossible to get it back into. It just won't compress enough once it's been used. It's not heavy at all and it's easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my Grizzly 700
customer_reviews.text: Plenty big and easy to install and has nice straps for windy weather. I've used it now for several months and it has worked well. From my first use I fitted it onto my ATV and and marked the center front and center back with outdoor paint. This makes it even easier to put the cover on.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome P. Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy, Very Big
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good buy, but will update as the months go by. It does bunch at the bottom with elastic for a snug fit and comes with straps to also hold it together/down. It also comes with a long additional strap to tie it up. The material is not very thick at all, but seems like good quality, so we will see how it holds up in our elements. I have a Raptor 700 ATV and this fits over the tires, to the ground, with plenty of room to spare. It’s actually a bit large for this atv, but totally fine with me.
customer_reviews.author: Kamie B

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it a week so far.....but we have had wind, rain, and snow...and it stayed in place and kept ATV dry. It is not heavy duty, but appears that it will hold up. It is also big, and not labeled for front, rear, etc.. After getting it on, and turning it several times, adjusting, etc... it fit great...then I took some white spray paint and painted small spots on the cover where the 3 headlights on the ATV are....now it only takes a couple of minutes to put it on, and line it up exactly where I want it.
customer_reviews.author: Ddd

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as description says
customer_reviews.text: This cover is decent, but the major flaw is that the elastic doesn't go around the entire bottom of the cover. Weak! Therefore, there is no way it is "trailerable at high speeds" as the description says. Wouldn't recommend any cover without elastic that goes around the entire bottom. Otherwise, you will be fetching it out of your neighbor's yard every time the wind blows hard. I am returning this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Jock

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of a lifetime guarantee and hope I ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my large 2 passenger ATV with room to spare. Has been waterproof during rain storms. I like the idea of a lifetime guarantee and hope I never have to use it.... but if I have to use it I will post here how they honored their guarantee. Very happy with it at this time
customer_reviews.author: N7KH

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Nothing
customer_reviews.text: If I had it to do again, I'd spend more money and get a better cover. This one is made of okay material; I'm curious to see if it will survive an Arizona summer. But it has NO eyelets anywhere for attaching straps or any way to secure the cover to the ATV, so I dunno why it could say it's trailerable. It comes with a single, long strap with some parachute clips that is in a permanent loop. No instructions so I really don't know what the idea is behind it. I've already thrown away the box or I would see about returning it.
customer_reviews.author: R. G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover but needs better hold down straps for trailering
customer_reviews.text: This cover is durable and covers my midsize ATV quite well. The only reason I didn't rate as a 5 was because strapping it down to make it trailerable was very difficult. It comes with one long strap and no type of attached hold downs on the cover. Going down the highway the cover nearly blew completely off. If there were attached straps I would have given it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Toastie Post

customer_reviews.title: Good price,  good quality and it is big enough to fit any quad.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many covers for my Yamaha 450 wolverine in the past. I would have to say this one rates as being top of the list. I will see how it hold up. Comes in a nice storage bag and has straps that you can tighten it around the bottom so I’m not looking for it the next morning in a wind storm. Very happy with this purchase!👍
customer_reviews.author: dale e hendershot

customer_reviews.title: This is lasted through the winter pretty well however I don't know how long it will ...
customer_reviews.text: This is lasted through the winter pretty well however I don't know how long it will actually last... It seems extremely weathered but it has kept my ATV dry out in the elements. Wish it had some tie-downs however had to stabilize it with bricks as the wind will take it off
customer_reviews.author: kitkat

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s job. Keeps the water off. Large enough to cover my Kawasaki Bruteforce 650 even with a storage rack on the back. The strap is unattached to the cover. I tighten it down around the tires and it keeps the cover secure
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great ATV Cover
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I was surprised just how nice this cover is. I bought one for my Kawasaki Brute Force 750 - fits perfectly, even without the straps cinched. Bought a second one for my smaller Yamaha Bruin 250 and it also fits well with the straps included to adjust it. Great value. They've held up to the Florida sun so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni B

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is terribly hard to buy presents for, but this time I really pleased him! At 74 years old, he bought an ATV and was worried about sun, rain, snow etc. I bought this for him for Christmas. He is very pleased with it. It fits perfectly and the material was nice. A good buy!
customer_reviews.author: quilt lady

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Fits larger ATVs
customer_reviews.text: This cover fit my 7 ft long Polaris Sportsman Touring edition with extra storage bags on the back perfectly.. the cover was good quality, did not feel cheap at all. Came with a strap in case you needed it to be more secure. I will keep mine out of the weather so it should last forever. No complaints. Buying another one for our second polaris!
customer_reviews.author: Shania

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I needed a ATV cover that was inexpensive but provide full coverage for my Rancher. This one fits well and gives more coverage than some others. Goes all the way to the ground on my ATV. Using in a carport, so it should last a while.... Delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.author: T S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I have several dirt bikes/quads. Trying to find covers for them has become a pain, not anymore. These are great covers and have lasted longer than I expected considering the price. So far, my parents have bought 3 and I have 2. Will only buys these covers from now on. I specifically like the strap they provide to go around the bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Pest Commander Pest Control

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I bought it for my 650 4X4 Big Bear. Fits a little big, but that let me tuck it under the wheels and tires. It is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: vernon jones

customer_reviews.title: Wind proof
customer_reviews.text: I have had at least 3 covers for my wheeler and every one of them either fell apart with the first wind or dry rotted in the sun but this one I just bought is better made with tie downs and you can truck it down the road and it stays on . I am very pleased and on top of it all it cost less that the others I have bought !
customer_reviews.author: Edwin E Ecker Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover for the price. Waterproof and the straps help keep it from blowing off in the wind. Watch out putting it on immediately after a ride though. The ATV exhaust melted a hole in it after our first ride.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Wilson

customer_reviews.title: does it all
customer_reviews.text: waterproof, standing the weather great so far, wind, rain an sun..fits my ole yamaha fine...like the fact it is not too tight on it so no punctures...so far, great an price is great too...
customer_reviews.author: gene

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty? Not.
customer_reviews.text: Just received it so I’ve really not had a true test of it. I’m a little disappointed that it’s described as heavy duty, Then you want me to rate it as light weight. 5 stars as to it being light weight. It’s very thin, not what I would call Heavy Duty at all.
customer_reviews.author: LQQKEN4ADEAL

customer_reviews.title: I bought this cover to cover the mahogany helm of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover to cover the mahogany helm of a vintage Boston Whaler and it works perfectly. It does not fasten tight enough to tow with it on, and I use a bungee to keep the wind from blowing it off when stored outside. Wished it has grommets or rope tie downs.
customer_reviews.author: Duane W

customer_reviews.title: Cover has elastic only on the ends
customer_reviews.text: This fits two up atv’s. Mine is a single but wanted extra length for a windshield. I wish there was elastic all the way around. The strap provided works well but not to easy to adjust length.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping rain and dust off.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT trailerable. It will keep the rain and dust off but I don't think it will hold up to to higher winds. It is nice and big. It fit over my Artic Cat 700.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Cover is heavy duty and not thin like the others out there. I don't see how you can trailer with this thing on as its big and really no way to secure it..It does have elastic around each corner. It's fitted on a 2008 King Quad 750 with bigger tires. Great cover!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works good but very large
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of them for 2 different ATVs. They seem decent and come with a carry pouch. They are very large. One ATV is a Honda recon250 and I could probably cover 2 of them. These fit larger ATVs better.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Swasey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, durable cover for my John Deer X364 mower
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my John Deer x354 riding lawnmower with dual bags and Shute attached. It keeps the mower dry under my deck and has enough elastic around the bottom to keep it secure during some pretty excessive wind storms we’ve had this fall.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick E. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Honda Rancher
customer_reviews.text: Stays on through the windiest, wettest storms and snow. Would buy again. UPDATE: Made it through 3 winters, then tore open. Faded quickly even though gets little direct sun. Trying a different brand this time. Had it been in full sun, it would not have lasted as long as it did.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Remote

customer_reviews.title: Good product and perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty large enough to cover my Polaris 570 Sportsman with a basket mounted on the back. Comes with a long nylon belt to tighten around cover to prevent strong winds from blowing off. Good material.
customer_reviews.author: Cherokee Mountain Horseman

customer_reviews.title: It works for  the money.  Not an everyday  use cover.
customer_reviews.text: This cover works. I wanted to cover my Honda 500 when I trailerd it 200 miles. It keep the ATV kleen. I don't know how well it would stay on with out extra strapping. It is not quick and easy to tie down your machine with the cover on. Also no access to the fuel tank.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Richer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, fit great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I have two and it keeps both my wheelers dry. One is a sportsman 800 and the other is a grizzly 700. They fit both wheelers perfect.
customer_reviews.author: D. Doxtater

customer_reviews.title: It works, how long is the real question.
customer_reviews.text: This is a thin cover, not sure how long it will last. It does have elastic and straps with clips, but I am not sure how you are supposed to clip the strap under the machine as the clips are right by where the tires are no matter how you turn the cover.
customer_reviews.author: THE DOC

customer_reviews.title: IT'S HUGE..
customer_reviews.text: WOW, this cover is HUGE. The elastic helps kept it somewhat on but I still have to use bonge cords for the wind. I like the bag. We had some rain a few days ago and it protected my ATV. It's doing what it was bought to do. Protect my ATV from the elements. Thanks, Seller
customer_reviews.author: Blaze166

customer_reviews.title: I have a 2016 Honda Rancher with a Koplin convertible ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2016 Honda Rancher with a Koplin convertible rear drop rack. The cover fits over all with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: ArkLunatic

customer_reviews.title: Slow shipping
customer_reviews.text: Slow shipping, great price, need to have sizes on the advertisement, it covers 2 youth ATVs side by side.
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a indoor cover.....
customer_reviews.text: I liked the featherweight design,but l think that was the wear and tear problem, it literally melted away the first winter. I'd say it was meant to be a indoor dust cover,definitely not meant for outside.....
customer_reviews.author: Mike Davidson

customer_reviews.title: 2019 Kawasaki Brute Force 4x4i EPS and more
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfect on my 2019 Kawasaki Brute Force 750 4x4i EPS and after got my rear passenger seat/storage installed it still fit.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Fit Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived but easily fit a 2010 Polaris Sportsman 500 HO with an additional basket one the rear. I was looking for a cover that would not just cover the top but pull down over the sides. This cover did just that.
customer_reviews.author: Oasis Crew

customer_reviews.title: Covers my Honda Foreman Just Fine
customer_reviews.text: This easily covers my Honda Foreman 450. It is a waterproof and fairly thin material. I think it will endure direct sunlight pretty well but only time will tell... It appears to be made well enough in terms of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tall Timbers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cover
customer_reviews.text: You can do a lot worse at this price, plenty big, swallowed up my sportsman 500 with room to spare, good heavy cinch straps hold it on tight.
customer_reviews.author: GuitarGuy69

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Just put it on and it looks lile it is durable and watet resistant. One guy complained so much, I say for the price you get a good deal, its bungee on the bottom and it comes with a longgggg... strap to tie around. It fits over my riding lawnmower and my daughter's 4 wheeler down to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Good indoors but not resistance enough to strong sun light
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t resist more than 5 month under direct sun light. I have mine in the street and after a couple month starts to get cracking and eventually with the wind it rips wide open.
customer_reviews.author: Joao campos forte

customer_reviews.title: Quality cover
customer_reviews.text: One size fits all because it's huge, too big for my Polaris 500, excellent quality though
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.M.

customer_reviews.title: I'm extremely happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good quality cover for the price. So good that I bought another one for my 2nd quad. I really like the elastic on the front and back. It not only helps keep it on, but also helps you know how to orient it when putting it on.
customer_reviews.author: James Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased other covers in the past for the same price that were noticeably thinner and didn't have straps on the bottom to keep it from blowing off. It fits nice on a polaris sportsman 570 with front and rear brush guards
customer_reviews.author: m sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my full size atv. Had the for a month and have held great to weather.
customer_reviews.author: Shark

customer_reviews.title: That they may not respond back plus It didn't have the nane on it that shows in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Hadn't had it in the weather yet to see about water proof but I order a large and the tag in mine says xxxl which is to big and would fly off or either tear up going down . This is my 2nd review and no response yet. May have to go back to indeed buggy .com
customer_reviews.author: Tim W.

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money somewhere else
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like shown in listing pictures. Poorly made, flimsy stiching, awkwardly sized
customer_reviews.author: tad

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Dont put it on until the engine cools off because it will burn a hole in it
customer_reviews.author: Momnurse

customer_reviews.title: Not as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: It didn't block water from day one... faded from the sun in six moths and had a rip in it within a year. Good short term solution or good dust cover when garaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D

customer_reviews.title: Fits arctic cat 650
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of size for 650 with oversized tires straps work great to keep cover on quad while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last
customer_reviews.text: WAS a great product until I used it TWICE and it ripped right down the middle. Tried to contact the seller but won’t show infor on Amazon or their website. Overall disappointed could have been a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit...good price. Don't trust to let it on during trailering but good cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product/Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: This. Is great product I'm actually using it to protect my riding lawnmower its bigger than it looks in the picturs but it's still a great buy !!!
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great bike cover
customer_reviews.text: Well made and waterproof! I bought one for an older bike, it worked so well i bought another for a newer bike i just purchased! These covers are great and do exactly what they advertise
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bailleau

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Still holding up after 1 summer in direct sun. It is pretty faded, but is still soft so I don't expect it to start tearing apart any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover, but the strap to hold it on doesn't work well. Have to put it back on anytime there is a harder breezes
customer_reviews.author: William Turner

customer_reviews.title: This cover is great!!
customer_reviews.text: Cover seems very well made and seems like it will last. Size is great and nice that it includes a strap for extra security!
customer_reviews.author: Paulette J Heber

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Want to order another. Great fit, good size. Really like the material. Was a better product than expected. Very happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart A. Moring

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It covers as I wanted. Light to handle, but strong to withstand these snow storms
customer_reviews.author: D. Lantz

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: This has really held up well so far this winter. I've had it a few weeks now and have left it out for several storms. It's durable, large, and and seems like it would last in the elements. I only use it when I move my ATV out of the garage (to make room for the cars) during snowstorms.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Strom

customer_reviews.title: Big cover
customer_reviews.text: Worked well to cover a large riding mower with rear bagger attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Herman

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to be an easy fit over the Honda Rincon . Use it every day...all summer....all winter.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working so far
customer_reviews.text: Thicker quality. Stays on. Seems to be working so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, waterproof, I haven't strapped it on and halled my ATV down the road yet with it on. But it seems to be very durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ATV cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits 2017 Polaris Sportsman 570 from to to bottom! Has elastic on bottom. Comes with a bag and nylon strap w/ buckle to tie around quad I assume when traveling. Great quality for the money
customer_reviews.author: Waylon Backer

customer_reviews.title: nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Keeps your four wheeler nice and dry. nice size. covers well
customer_reviews.author: jelaine

customer_reviews.title: nice and big
customer_reviews.text: husband keeps his bike covered and this has worked in high winds and hard rains. We did have to add extra straps to keep it on the bike during micro bursts of wind
customer_reviews.author: C. Farley

customer_reviews.title: Very large
customer_reviews.text: This cover is very large but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Austin White

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent cover for $20. Don't know if I'd trust it while trailering, but perfect for keeping dust and water off during storage/non-use.
customer_reviews.author: mattvand

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not the high quality that I expected.... I will probably try and sell these... You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Meredithlily

customer_reviews.title: big enough!
customer_reviews.text: Most universal covers are a joke and would barely fit a child's Quad....but this one is generous in size and is thick enough that it should hold up for several years. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anji

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once but it seems to be very waterproof. Plenty big enough to completely cover my Honda Rincon. Will have to wait and see how durable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not very thick, and the clip for the draw strap broke the first time I put the cover on. Cheap cheap cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jay & Hannah H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchase two of these and they fit great! They work for just about all size four wheelers
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover that fit perfectly on my 04 Polaris 500. Wind hasnt budget it. Very glad that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Russell S.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, covers my ATV or my 3 wheel bike. Very light, easy to use and affordable. I tried a few other covers and this is the highest quality by far. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS THING IS SO YUUUGE IT WOULD PROBABLY COVER A JOHN DEERE GATOR!!!
customer_reviews.text: There's a tiny tag on the inside of this ATV cover that says 3XL, and is it ever!!! If it doesn't blow off in tomorrow's thunderstorms, the bottom third of it will be laying in the mud. I'll edit this review once the storms have passed.
customer_reviews.author: J.L. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy fabric. My only complaint is that it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made cover. Sturdy fabric. My only complaint is that it is too big for my ATV. I have a Polaris Sportsman 500.
customer_reviews.author: R Y

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good cover. Way better than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Randall53

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Plent big for my Honda rencon 700. I live in Florida so time will tell how it holds up. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: glen hall

customer_reviews.title: Winter cover ATV and plow.
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to Polars 850. Hard to tell front from back. Will see how it is in high winds
customer_reviews.author: David L. Ruffell

customer_reviews.title: Works as stated.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2006 Polaris Sportsman 500 with rack extension on it.
customer_reviews.author: NMSERE

customer_reviews.title: Fits Big ATV
customer_reviews.text: Fit and look definitely 5 stars, performance we will see over the winter but it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Edo

customer_reviews.title: Plenty big for any atv, good material for price.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty big for any wheeler. I needed something to cover my atv with a drop gate box on back. Keeps rain out. Not heavy duty but it's good material for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great sise. Works well on my Honda Foreman with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sise . Works well on my Honda Foreman with a back seat on it . Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay on
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't stay on the ATV when there even just ligh light breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It keeps her dry!
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should, it was a little bigger than I thought it would be but that's ok- it does it's job on my old Yamaha ATV!
customer_reviews.author: Old'nCranky

customer_reviews.title: ok product
customer_reviews.text: OK for the price, not heavy duty at all but worth the price for a temporary cover when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tukngo

customer_reviews.title: Weak straps
customer_reviews.text: I got this cover and took it out of the package and it is very thin, light weight, no silver on the inside. The strap broke the first time I pulled on it. I don’t think it will last long. Not too pleased with it. But it will keep the rain off for now......
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Hill

customer_reviews.title: BEST OF THE CHEAP COVERS
customer_reviews.text: Id have to say this is the best of the cheap atv covers good material that doesn’t rip easily and comes with straps to hold it to the wheeler so it does’t blow around in the wind
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Moses

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I’d ordered similar covers for riding lawn mowers and they were fine. I ordered this one for my Polaris 500. Fit pretty good, but tore at the seams and water was getting through. I had to use a tarp to keep the water out. Now I just use the tarp.
customer_reviews.author: Rob1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cover. Fits over the largest ATVs you can get.
customer_reviews.author: John Pozadzides

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: I have polaris 570 and it fits great. Big enough to cover the entire atv.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Fits large ATVS
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Large enough for large ATVs with back travel box
customer_reviews.author: Gopa

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: It has everything the husband wanted (water proof, UV protection, dust cover, and a way to hold it down). Will have to waite for winter to see how it hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Hanifin

product_meta.title: XYZCTEM Waterproof ATV Cover, Heavy Duty Black Protects 4 Wheeler From Snow Rain or Sun, Large Universal Size Fits 103 inch For Most Quads
product_meta.description:
XYZCTEM ATV Cover - Black Universal Size

Dirt and mud that covers your 4 wheeler after a long day of off-road fun can easily be sprayed off with water. The real damage is what happens to your quad while you store and transport it.

See the images above for your SOLUTION to protecting your ATV from nature’s harm!

RAIN OR SHINE, NOT A PROBLEM - Don’t be that guy riding around on a faded or moldy quad. Cover your baby when not in use to maintain that fresh paint job and prolong the life of your engine!

HASSLE FREE EXPERIENCE - Our covers include an elastic base to make it easy to cover and uncover your off road vehicle. Made to grip around tires, you will never struggle with this falling off or coming loose!

ONE SIZE FITS MOST - 103” x 43” x 47” fits most Honda, Yamaha, Polaris, Suzuki, Kawasaki,Such as Suzuki 400 eiger,Honda foreman,Honda rancher,Polaris Sportsman,Polaris Sportsman 570,Trailerable,Rhino, Drawstring,Quad gear,with Windshield, Can-Am and Arctic Cat models of ATVs!

Includes a FREE storage bag to carry your cover when you are out on your adventures!

24 Hours Service & STORAGE BAG-Feel free to contact us if any issue we will provide serive in 24 Hours 

Simply click ADD TO CART NOW!
feature_bullets: Safeguard your quad from wet and freezing weather with durable poly material cover; breathable fabric allows moisture to escape
Thick UV resistant canvas stays strong in the blazing sun so you can avoid fading paint; keep the same shine on your 4 wheeler that it had the first day you brought it home
Large 103 x 43 x 47 inch surface area fits easily over most models of small to extra large ATVs; elastic base wraps around tires with minimal effort and stays on while trailing on the freeway
Includes a handy storage bag so you can fold up the cover and stash it while you are out riding; small enough to conveniently place in your ATV box or backseat of your car
24 Hours Service & STORAGE BAG-Feel free to contact us if any issue we will provide serive in 24 Hours
